sentences.sentence: If one torr equals 1 millimeter of mercury, then 1 millitorr must be equivalent to 1 micrometer of mercury, right?
sentences.translation: 如果1托等于1毫米汞柱，那么1毫托一定等于1微米汞柱，对吧？

sentences.sentence: 195torr The vapor pressure is 25.195 torr at 27 degrees C.
Three types of ion gauges with tube electron multiplier are developed. It intends to solve the low pressure measurements up to 10~(-14) torr.
sentences.translation: 研制成功了三种结构的具有管型电子倍增器的电离规，企图解决低到10~（-14）托的压强测量问题。
